channel.title: My Workstation cant find /boot/grub/i386-pc/normal.mod
channel.description: hello, i have arch linux i have installed and configured whonix and qemu but only whonix gateway work and successfully connect to tor whonix workstation wont start and show grub rescue try to reinstall twice, also checked shasum grub path is empty

item.title: My Workstation cant find /boot/grub/i386-pc/normal.mod
item.dc:creator: tadzylemke
item.description:
hello, i have arch linux
i have installed and configured whonix and qemu
but only whonix gateway work and successfully connect to tor
whonix workstation wont start and show grub rescue
try to reinstall twice, also checked shasum
grub path is empty

Read full topic
